meanings.definition: Larrupers: people or things that strike or beat forcefully
meanings.sent1: The larrupers in the movie were the heroes who defeated the villains with their powerful blows.
meanings.sent2: The larrupers, like hammers on nails, pounded the drums with great force.
meanings.sent3: The larrupers at the construction site swung their hammers with precision and strength.
meanings.sent4: The larrupers of the storm mercilessly pounded the roof, creating a symphony of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The larrupers in the boxing ring delivered knockout punches one after another.

meanings.definition: Larrupers: to strike or beat forcefully
meanings.sent1: She larrupers the dough to make it soft and pliable for baking.
meanings.sent2: The blacksmith larrupers the hot metal to shape it into a sturdy horseshoe.
meanings.sent3: The chef larrupers the ingredients together to create a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent4: The waves larrupers against the shore, eroding the cliffs over time.
meanings.sent5: He larrupers the drum with such intensity that the sound echoes through the room.

meanings.sent1: The larrupers storm shook the windows with its powerful gusts of wind.
meanings.sent2: The larrupers waves crashed against the rocks, sending spray into the air.
meanings.sent3: The larrupers drumming of the band energized the crowd at the concert.
meanings.sent4: The larrupers blows of the boxer left his opponent staggering in the ring.
meanings.sent5: The larrupers sound of thunder echoed through the valley, signaling the approaching storm.
